website_summaries.verdict: A stellar accordion from a reputable manufacturer. The best on the market.
pros: A three-row accordion with a top-notch sound
Plays in G, C, F and their relative minors
cons: Costs more than any other instrument on our list but is affordable when compared to similar products

customer_reviews.title: Robust and fun to play
customer_reviews.text: Robust and fun to play. Be careful this is a Diatonic machine meaning two tones in one button when you are pulling and pushing are different sound making playing more difficult. An easier machine is Chromatic B type or C type, double the buttons but tones will not change when you pushing or pulling the bellow.
customer_reviews.author: kacey wong

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as my first accordion. Hohner doesn’t disappoint with this instrument. Easy to play and clear and crisp sound. I would recommend this if you are starting to play and learn accordion.
customer_reviews.author: Ines B.

customer_reviews.title: one also needs strength of the left fingers to push the bass buttons down!
customer_reviews.text: not a bad box overall! the worse was the "clickiti clack" of the bass buttons! for that i had to return it. otherwise, i'd would have kept it. HI.
customer_reviews.author: herman ivanow

customer_reviews.title: Best value and sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for family members they are perfect for the type of music they play as well as they are not overly heavy i also love that it comes with a parts sheet for re ordering parts only thing it didnt have was instruction for installing the straps but i was able to get it on youtube
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: This accordion sounds amazing! It's my first accordion and I am blown away by the quality. I did have an issue with one of the straps breaking almost immediately upon use but Hansel from Front Row Electronics fixed my issue within 10 minutes of me listing the issue. Great customer support. Something to note: Though the listing shows the accordion comes with a thumb strap, THIS DOES NOT COME WITH A THUMB STRAP.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Straps seem to be a little short
customer_reviews.text: This product did not disappoint I bought it for my husband and he was so surprised and has loved it ever cents. I will say the only setback is that the straps seem to be a little bit short
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good accordion
customer_reviews.text: Nice accordion got it cheap one day it was for 320 dollars i bought it the second I saw it
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Hohner Panther
customer_reviews.text: I received a brand new model panther which Pleased me very much . It plays wonderfully. All buttons work and the bellows are soft and have no air escaping. This is an excellent model for beginner and intermediate players. It came with standard straps which slide and I have already put leather ones on instead. We use these models for teaching purposes and find them to be good for our twelve yr. Old children. It weighs about 22 pounds. It came in about a week free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: There's no instructions on how to use it, asked the seller for the manual, all I got is one page button chart which means nothing to me as a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmet Pamuk

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery/ Clear Sound
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered earlier than expected despite there being a later delivery date. As soon as I started playing it, it had a smooth and sharp sound. Everything about the instrument was legit!
customer_reviews.author: wiz

customer_reviews.title: Good accordion to learn play on.
customer_reviews.text: I’m learning to play the accordion and this is my first one. So far I’m liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few momths ago and I love my instrument! It came so well prepared and even with instructions. The quality is astonishing! Overall I love it and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Beltran

customer_reviews.title: I like to play my panther! sounds great for the price! light weight!
customer_reviews.text: I like to play acordeon and this acordeon is awsome! Soft buttons, light weight, easy to handle, great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Andres Ramos

customer_reviews.title: The Best Purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: My dad is so ecstatic for this gift. He just can't stop playing! Love , Love to hear him play
customer_reviews.author: Palestrina George

customer_reviews.title: Buenisimo!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice accordion, great sound, great look with matte finish!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hohner Panther you really get fbe instead of the gcf
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this he really likes it but be careful the title says g/c/f but you end up getting the fbe we didn't return it because we hate returning things so he'll just adapt to this one
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and good quality accordion recomend for beginners and intermediate players
customer_reviews.author: humberto garcia

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Plays great! Awesome sound, very pleased! Comes in original box with its straps and paperwork !
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: The accordion Hohner panther G/C/F is a great accordion the sound is loud and great, I'm love this accordion too much.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for a beginner's instrument that doesn't need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for a beginner's instrument that doesn't need to be replaced after gaining experience. The only negative I have is that the bellows straps and the bass side strap are a little "cheesy." The left side trap needs to be adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: Awesome , really good quality, good price, and good sound. Its just a good a accordion to start learning. ,
customer_reviews.author: Raul Carrillo

customer_reviews.text: good product it was what I expected I recommend 100.% i will buy again this product if i needed ;)
customer_reviews.author: seo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound, look, and feel.
customer_reviews.text: Well, what can I say, it's my first accordion, but it like the way it sounds. It's a very easy to play instrument. If I had my own studio, I'd be practicing hour after hour, but you know how it is when you have a family. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Top Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: A great instrument!
customer_reviews.text: A great beginner's accordion. Just the right size, has good sound, and the keys work well. Would SOMEONE - PLEASE give me a diagram or instructions on how to attach and use the straps? I have had the instrument for a couple of months and it still doesn't feel or look right.
customer_reviews.author: Ax

customer_reviews.title: Hohner Panther
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Hopefully one day I'm able to play some songs. The straps are quite confusing but I managed to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great Instrument for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this accordion. Although made in china hohner seems to make sure it's still good quality. Great sound and overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Can't argue for the price awesome bargain! But even for the price it surprisingly out exceeds the quality. Very well built and does not feel cheap one bit. Very great would highly recommend it A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Modest

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had it more than one year and it still sounds great. I would recommend this product. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Efren Q. Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.. Already Learned How To Play Instantly Great Sound... Very Good And im Glad With Purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mark.Lsx

customer_reviews.title: SO IN LOVE WITH IT! GREAT FOR STARTERS LIKE ME!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not gave it the 5 stars is because the leather band that supports the left hand leaves a huge gap and for me it would have to be fixed or adjusted. I do not know if this is the same with other accordions or brand. But besides that, THE SOUND of this box really makes a difference among other brands =) The design and color are great also! It really worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Padilla

customer_reviews.title: The straps
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this accordion and my husband likes it more than I do. The only thing we both found wrong with this instrument is that there are no instructions for putting on the straps. Both my husband and myself have never played this instrument before so I guess we need to take a lesson in putting on the straps.
customer_reviews.author: AD Coles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A Really good A Great accordion Excellent texture Love the panther I really recommend this piece of art 100% satisfy
customer_reviews.author: Chaloyasociados

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: sound is amazing but instrument quality not so good components are to cheap
customer_reviews.author: Fermin Galeno

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: One of the keys didn't work on the Accordion as soon as I got it. I only found out today when I called my dad and he told me about it. Otherwise it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional Beginner accordian.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone trying to learn the accordian should look into getting a Panther. great sound, louder and clearer than most accordians even close to this price range. really good button feel.
customer_reviews.author: rigo Valverde

customer_reviews.title: Overall though aside from that its great if you want to play a diatonic accordion and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had returned this accordion but its only because I thought it would have built in stereos before. Overall though aside from that its great if you want to play a diatonic accordion and has a mp3 jack for silent practice. Not having built in stereos made it un practicle to me for taking accordion lessons/classes though. Wish they would make a new version with built in stereos. I have been thinkning about the frx1 button accordion or 3 but those are much more expensive than this as well.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Is the best option if you search a cheap accordion, good quality and sounds great, i recomend this instrument for to learn with eyes close.
customer_reviews.author: aliumbriel

customer_reviews.title: Great Accordion
customer_reviews.text: i got this accordion on Friday 9/10/10,And so far it's been a great purchase the quality of the accordion is very good and the sound is even better not to mention it's a hohner accordion.couldn't ask for a better accordion for the price
customer_reviews.author: miguel89

product_meta.title: Hohner Panther G/C/F 3-Row Diatonic Accordion - Black
product_meta.description: Style:Diatonic AccordionMaybe this is the most intuitive form of music making: to pick up an instrument and simply start to play it. Where is which note? One learns this in short time by heart &n dash; with these instruments, one does not think about music, one simply plays it! Hohners Panther is its most affordable 3 row accordion. It shares many of the same quality features as other Hohner three-row diatonic accordions and has double strap brackets. Features: Treble Buttons: 31 (3 rows) Bass/Chord Buttons: 12 Treble Reeds: 2 sets Key Combination: GCF Color: Painted Matte Black Weight: 9 lbs. Size: 7.5" deep by 12" high.
feature_bullets: Comes in Matte Black and only in the key of GCF.
31 buttons, 12 bass buttons, and a double strap brackets.
Comes with Straps, Cleaning Cloth, and Hohner Diatonic Method Book. No Gig Bag
Warranty is for parts and labor to repair any manufacturer defects. it lasts for 90 days after the purchase date

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
